description: Header file defining the WelcomeWidget class, which inherits from QWidget and includes a QLabel. The class is likely part of a wxWidgets-based desktop application, providing a user interface component to welcome users.

classes.name: WelcomeWidget
classes.description: A QWidget-derived class representing a welcome widget, likely used as a UI component to display a welcome message or screen in the application.

methods.name: WelcomeWidget
